Posts.Content: Jun 25, 2009 01:25AM nikkilee wrote: I saw your post through a search engine mines not breasts but I had a tumor removed in my leg that I ran across the same thing tried the neosporin too but have this rash red spots with white bumps now there was no tape near the incision or part where my insicion is the doctor mentioned i can use cortesone on the rash but not on the insicion well gee the rash is along the insicion. I use and have used ever since my surgery date of washing it for 3 weeks with the hibicleanse soap that they asked me to use before surgery it states it's good for surgery's but I still have this rash and it itches like crazy!!! Help I've tried to ignore and not scratch but it's gotten bigger the rash that is and more intence and I don't want to cause more problems by itching it.
Posts.Title: weird rash along incision site sandilee NST40
